summary: RaceMenu Preset of Geralt of Rivia from the Witcher series.
descriptionHtml:
There are many Geralt Presets on the Nexus but I don´t like them, so I create my own.

 Race: Nord
 Gender: Male

 REQUIRED/RECOMMENDED:
 - of course the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]expired6978[/url]
 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411]Brows[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027]lthot[/url]
 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363]Beards[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027]lthot[/url]
 - for Witcher hairstyle you will need the main file of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283148]apachii[/url]
 - for Witcher eyes you will need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5632]Witcher eyes[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/903173]Suhoi72[/url]
 - in the Screenshoots i also use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/726673]Xenius[/url]
 - armor in the pictures: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71762]Witcher 3 Kaer Morhen Armour[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3413898]devilhacker[/url] with better textures ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73857]Witcher Kaer Morhen armour upgrade[/url]) by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/212132]Pfuscher
[/url]
 CREDITS:
 All credit goes to the Mod authors mentioned before
author: JonasMathias
